2016 WW42 Purley-FPGA Server SKX/LBG B-Stepping Gold Release Announcement (BKC #2)

\n \n \n

DEG Platform Integration Team

\n \n
\n

The DEG platform Integration team announces the release of 2016 WW42 Purley-FPGA Server SKX/LBG B-Stepping Gold release package for Intel internal use. The release is based on OS of\n \n Linux\n server. The auto-installer packages are available on the Artifactory server (both SH site and OR site). Any questions please contact Bei, Ling.

\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Auto InstallerSH Artifactory ServerOR Artifactory Server
LinuxWithoutOS_BKC-PurleyFPGA_BkcLinux_42.103604-2016WW42.zip\n \n
RHEL7.2x86_64.zip\n 		WithoutOS_BKC-PurleyFPGA_BkcLinux_42.103604-2016WW42.zip\n \n
RHEL7.2x86_64.zip\n
\n

*Note: Please select the server which is closer to your region to get the better data accessing/downloading performance

Test Result:

\xc2\xb7       Finish\nBKC test execution on RHEL 7.2. Please visit HPQC for\ntest details

\xc2\xb7       Purley FPGA (RP Board: Neon City FPGA)

o    Total test cases: 27 ; Passed test\ncases is 20 and pass rate is 81.48%. The full validation result can be found in OSS

o    Test\ncoverage:  SKX-FPGA B0/LBG B1: Run full coverage of BKC test cases.

 

Sighting Update:

\xc2\xb7       Key\nSightings:

o   5345414 [2016_WW40\nBKC][BIOS:102_D12][Neon city FPGA] Only one FPGA device 0x09cb is listed

o   5345419 [2016_WW40\nBKC][BIOS:102_D12][Neon city FPGA]Cannot ping BMC IP in RHEL    

\xc2\xb7       New\nand closed sightings can be found here; Full sighting list can\nbe found in HSD

 

SW&HW Configurations:

\xc2\xb7    CPLD and BMC updated this week

\xc2\xb7       SW\nand IFWI changes can be found here ; HW configuration can be found here

\xc2\xb7       \nWA/HW Reword can be found here

\n   HW Rework \n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n \n \n \n \n
\n

Key Workaround (detail guide is here)

\n\n

\xc2\xb7        \nPlease use PCIe Video card instead of onboard BMC video due to\nknown BMC issue

\n\n

 

\n\n

Pedigree and Board Jumper Settings: guide

\n\n

Note:\nOnly mandatory and necessary optional rework is implemented by BKC team

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework FPGA JTAG chain missing CPU1\nTCK resistor

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework to replace FPGA KR RX AC Caps

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework add a pull down to RSMRST

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework to update VR FW

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nRequired CPLD updates to address reset and FSC\nissues

\n\nCPLD updates to address IFWI issue with 2 SKX\nFPGA CPUs populated
\n \n
